name: reversal
flavor_text: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.
effect_text_extend:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power varies inversely with the user's proportional remaining HP.

64 * current HP / max HP | Power
-----------------------: | ----:
 0– 1                    |  200
 2– 5                    |  150
 6–12                    |  100
13–21                    |   80
22–42                    |   40
43–64                    |   20
effect_text_simple: Inflicts more damage when the user has less HP remaining, with a maximum of 200 power.
